title: Products
cleaned_text: more than 530 classical formulations which fall in the nine categories: ARISHTA / ASAVA (FERMENTED FORMULATION) / BHASMA (CALICINATED DRUG) CHURNA (POWDERED HERB) / GHRITA (GHEE / GULIKA 8000 E-mail : [mail@aryavaidyasala.in](mailto:mail@aryavaidyasala.in) AVS offers classical Ayurvedic medicines and authentic Ayurvedic treatments and therapies to patients from all over India and abroad.
